data.title: Bunker Bean by Wilson, Harry Leon: Very Good Hardcover (1913) First Thus.

data.text:
About this Item

First Edition Thus, First Printing. Published by Grosset & Dunlap, 1913. Octavo. Green cloth boards stamped in green. Book is very good. Sharp corners and spine straight. Binding tight and pages crisp. Previous owner name on flyleaf. Dust jacket is very good with shelf wear, edge wear, and tears. Book placed in custom acetate protector. 307 pages plus 4 of ads. 100% positive feedback. 30 day money back guarantee. NEXT DAY SHIPPING! Excellent customer service. Please email with any questions or if you would like a photo. All books packed carefully and ship with free delivery confirmation/tracking. All books come with free bookmarks. Ships from Southampton, New York. We Buy Books! Individual titles, libraries, collections. Message us if you have books to sell!. Seller Inventory # 110018

Contact seller

Report this item

We are located in the village of Sag Harbor, New York. We sell both new and collectible books. Most of our first edition and collectibles are listed on Abebooks, but please contact us if you are looking for anything particular.

Visit Seller's Storefront

Seller's business information

Southampton Books LLC

16 Hampton Road, Southampton, NY, 11968, U.S.A.

Terms of Sale:

We offer a 30 day money back guarantee if you are unhappy with your purchase for

any reason or if you decided you no longer need the purchased book.

Southampton Books

www.southamptonsagharborbooks.com

Southampton Books

Shipping Terms:

Orders always ship the next business day after a sale. All books are packed in multiple layers of bubble wrap and in sturdy boxes. The only time a book will ship in an envelope is that if you request Priority Mail Padded Envelope shipping, but rest assured the book will be wrapped securely in multiple layers and the corners will be protected.
